rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south facade to maximize natural light, incorporating Brutalist aesthetics through raw concrete finishes and exposed structural elements.
Functional kitchen designed with modern appliances and Brutalist style elements; includes a breakfast nook adjacent to the living room.
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen with raw concrete walls and minimalist design.
Master bedroom designed with ample closet space and a small attached balcony to enhance privacy, following Vastu principles for north-east direction.
Guest bedroom with a window facing east for natural morning light and adherence to Vastu guidelines.
Efficient bathroom with built-in storage and fixtures; water elements are oriented per Vastu recommendations.
Utility room for storage of household items and cleaning supplies; integrated within the kitchen area.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing the street, designed with reinforced steel and concrete elements to align with Brutalist design.
Floor-to-ceiling window on the south facade of the living room for maximum light exposure and views.
